name: Towards The Pantheon: Escaping Eternity
description: A soldier wakes up in darkness with a headache - Where is he, and how did he get here? Towards The Pantheon: Escaping Eternity is a prequel mystery minigame to the upcoming full length RPG Towards The Pantheon.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, or 10 Processor: 1.5 GHz, single core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Any Storage: 200 MB available space
